dcterms:creator: C. Beckel
W. Kleiminger
R. Cicchetti
T. Staake
S. Santini
dcterms:description: The ECO dataset includes 1 Hz electricity usage measured by smart meters along with the occupancy labels of five houses in Switzerland. The measurements sampling rate is chosen as 15 minutes, and episodes with the length of a day are considered.
dcterms:title: Electricity Consumption and Occupancy (ECO) dataset
